message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to let it go for $175. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you can take advantage of it!
I'm interested in the product, but $175 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $175 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $155. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $155 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?

Hi Bob, I understand that $155 is still a bit too high for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $142.50. This is my final offer, so I hope you can take advantage of it!

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $142.50 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $130 and $142.50, which would be $136.25. Would you be willing to accept this price?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're willing to meet me halfway, but I'm not willing to go as low as $136.25. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $140. This is my final offer, so I hope you can take advantage of it!

I'm not willing to go any higher than $130. I've already compromised a lot, and I think that's the best price I can offer. If you're not willing to meet me at $130, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $100.
